alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:20AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dawson County through 345 AM CDT... At 319 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gothenburg, or 25 miles northwest of Lexington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Willow Island around 330 AM CDT. Cozad around 335 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
